domain.name: CLONGDESCRIPTION
domain.description: a very long text field (up to 32000 characters)

domain.name: CSHORTDESCRIPTION
domain.description: a very long text field (up to 10000 characters)

domain.name: CSMALLDESCRIPTION
domain.description: a smaller text field (up to 10000 characters)

domain.name: CQUERY
domain.description: a text field for storing queries

domain.name: CMOREPROPS
domain.description: a text field for storing properties

domain.name: CCRYPTKEY
domain.description: a text field for a cryptograhic key

domain.name: CLONGTEXTVALUE
domain.description: a generic long text value field

table.name: TACL
table.description: Describes which person has which role in which project.

table.name: TBASELINE
table.description: For each workitem this table contains the history of start and due dates.

table.name: TCATEGORY
table.description: Holds all known issue types.

column.name: LABEL
column.description: The name of this issue type. Localization will be applied if possible by the business logic.

column.name: SYMBOL
column.description: File name for a small graphical symbol (GIF or PNG)

column.name: CSSSTYLE
column.description: CSS styles for rows with this issue type

table.name: TCLASS
table.description: A class is just a special project specific list field, e.g. for categorizing issues further into documentation related issues, hardware related issues, etc.

table.name: TDEPARTMENT
table.description: This table holds the departments. Each user belongs to one department.

column.name: PKEY
column.description: This table holds the notification configuration for each user.

column.name: PROJCATKEY
column.description: Notify me only for this project component (category).

column.name: STATEKEY
column.description: Notify me only for these statuses.

column.name: WORKITEM
column.description: If this is null, this pertains to the regular watch list, otherwise it pertains to this specific WORKITEM.

column.name: RACIROLE
column.description: Abbreviation for RACI roles of (C)onsulted or (I)nformed

table.name: TPERSON
table.description: This table holds all user related information, like user name, e-mail, etc.

column.name: PREFERENCES
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: ISGROUP
column.description: Groups are treated like users in most cases.

column.name: USERLEVEL
column.description: The user capability level, e.g. full user, limited user, sysadmin, sysman

column.name: MAXASSIGNEDITEMS
column.description: maximal number of assigned items for this person

column.name: MESSENGERURL
column.description: the instant messenger URL

column.name: CALLURL
column.description: the voice URL

column.name: SYMBOL
column.description: File name for a photo

column.name: ICONKEY
column.description: The photo stored in the database blob

column.name: SYMBOL
column.description: File name for a small graphical symbol (GIF or PNG)

column.name: CSSSTYLE
column.description: CSS style for rows with this priority

column.name: MOREPROPS
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: TAGLABEL
column.description: A user defined tag used for filtering/grouping the projects

column.name: MOREPROPS
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: SYMBOL
column.description: File name for a small graphical symbol (GIF or PNG)

column.name: CSSSTYLE
column.description: CSS style for rows with this severity

column.name: SYMBOL
column.description: File name for a small graphical symbol (GIF or PNG)

column.name: CSSSTYLE
column.description: CSS style for rows with this status

column.name: ESCALATIONLEVEL
column.description: the last escalation e-mail was sent for this level

column.name: MOREPROPS
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: MOREPROPS
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: MOREPROPS
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: PREFERENCES
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: FIELDTYPE
column.description: show or grouping

column.name: EXPANDING
column.description: used only for grouping fields

column.name: LAYOUTKEY
column.description: report overview, issue overview history/comment/attachment/worlog/watchers/version... etc.

column.name: QUERYID
column.description: specified for query specific layout

column.name: QUERYTYPE
column.description: specifies the type of the query: manager, reponsible, tree, tql private, etc.

column.name: MOREPROPS
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: BUDGETTYPE
column.description: top-down (agreement) or bottom up (commitment) budget

column.name: SYMBOL
column.description: File name for a small graphical symbol (GIF or PNG)

column.name: CSSSTYLE
column.description: CSS style for rows with this system status

column.name: MOREPROPS
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: PROJECT
column.description: specified if dashboard screen is project specific

column.name: ENTITYTYPE
column.description: whether the dashboard screen is project specific or release specific

column.name: GROOVYSCRIPT
column.description: script for calculated fields

column.name: TAGLABEL
column.description: A user defined tag used for filtering/grouping the lists

column.name: MOREPROPS
column.description: parameters for configuring the list import/synchronisation

column.name: SYMBOL
column.description: File name for a small graphical symbol (GIF or PNG)

column.name: CSSSTYLE
column.description: CSS style for rows with this option

column.name: TAGLABEL
column.description: A user defined tag used for filtering/grouping the screens

column.name: ACTIONTYPE
column.description: whether it is a workflow action or a general item action (used in screen assignments)

column.name: TABLENAME
column.description: Not used at this time

column.name: PRIMARYKEYVALUE
column.description: for this field name, the actual object

column.name: FIELDNAME
column.description: field.systemSelect.4., field.tooltip, etc.)

column.name: MOREPROPS
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: REFRESHCONFIGURATION
column.description: In case of configuration change, this is set to the number of nodes. As each node updates its configuration, the count is decremented.

column.name: FIRSTTIME
column.description: When this is the first start after a version upgrade, go to site configuration

column.name: MOREPROPS
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

column.name: OBJECTID
column.description: This helps with the bookkeeping of logged in users

column.name: NODEADDRESS
column.description: The ip address of the node which counts these numbers

column.name: SESSIONID
column.description: The session id under which this user was logged

column.name: LOGGEDUSER
column.description: Foreign key reference to TPERSON

column.name: USERLEVEL
column.description: Indicates a full or limited user

column.name: LASTUPDATE
column.description: This enables to clean the table in case of a crash

column.name: MOREPROPS
column.description: This is a multi-purpose field. It contains a text in .properties format with a number of additional attributes.

table.name: CLUSTERNODE
table.description: This table holds properties for each node in the cluster

column.name: NODEADDRESS
column.description: The ip address of this node

column.name: NODEURL
column.description: The URL where the managing instance of this node can be reached

column.name: LASTUPDATE
column.description: This enables to clean the table in case of a crash

column.name: MASTERNODE
column.description: If this is the master node, this value is > 0

column.name: RELOADCONFIG
column.description: If this is not 0, reload the configuration from TSITE

column.name: RELOADCHANGES
column.description: A comma separated string representing entity types to reload

table.name: TENTITYCHANGES
table.description: This table holds the changed entities for updating the full text search index in each clusternode

table.name: TSUMMARYMAIL
table.description: This table holds the summary mail parts before they are sent

table.name: TOUTLINECODE
table.description: Holds the outline codes

table.name: TOUTLINETEMPLATEDEF
table.description: defines the parts of an outline code

table.name: TOUTLINETEMPLATE
table.description: Holds the association between the entity and the outline template

table.name: TSCRIPTS
table.description: Contains Groovy scripts

column.name: SCRIPTTYPE
column.description: groowy or javascript

column.name: SCRIPTROLE
column.description: from where to use it: from field config, workflow etc.

table.name: TREVISION
table.description: Comments from the version control system

table.name: TREVISIONWORKITEMS
table.description: Comments from the version control system

table.name: TREPOSITORY
table.description: Version control repositiories defined

table.name: TTEMPLATEPERSON
table.description: The persons who can or can not run a report template

column.name: RIGHTFLAG
column.description: whether the right is added or revoked

column.name: RECURRENCEPERIOD
column.description: daily, weekly, monthly or yearly

column.name: DAYS
column.description: the weekdays by weekly pattern

column.name: DATEISABSOLUTE
column.description: by monthly and yearly an absolute date

table.name: TFILTERCATEGORY
table.description: Hierarchical categorization of the queries

table.name: TREPORTCATEGORY
table.description: Hierarchical categorization of the reports

table.name: TMENUITEMQUERY
table.description: Describes which queries are included in the person menu

table.name: TCHILDISSUETYPE
table.description: Describes that a parent item issue type which issue types can have as child

table.name: TPERSONBASKET
table.description: WorkItem baskets for persons

table.name: TBASKET
table.description: WorkItem baskets for persons

column.name: DIVISIBLE
column.description: Whether to basked can be further divided in user defined basket branches

column.name: PARENTBASKET
column.description: Some baskets can be further divided in branches: like the Reference basket

column.name: PERSON
column.description: The person who created this user defined basket branch or private basket branch

table.name: TMAILTEMPLATE
table.description: Locale independent template names for notification emails

column.name: TEMPLATETYPE
column.description: filter for event types like: single edit, mass edit, reminder, new user

column.name: TAGLABEL
column.description: A user defined tag used for filtering/grouping the templates

table.name: TMAILTEMPLATEDEF
table.description: Locale and e-mail type specific template definitions for notification emails

table.name: TLASTVISITEDITEM
table.description: WorkItems last visited by a person

column.name: TAGLABEL
column.description: A user defined tag used for filtering/grouping the workflows

column.name: NAME
column.description: if name is not specified the status label should be taken

column.name: WORKFLOW
column.description: workflow might have importance temporarily, in design mode (when no TWORKFLOWTRANSITION is linked yet with this station)

column.name: NODEX
column.description: the x coordinate of this node

column.name: NODEY
column.description: the y coordinate of this node

column.name: STATIONTYPE
column.description: whether the station is backed by a status or is a pseudo station (like not existing/deleted)

column.name: ACTIVITYTYPE
column.description: whether it is GroovyScript, new man, new resp, escalation, create child issue, send e-mail etc.

column.name: ACTIVITYPARAMS
column.description: parameters for some activity types: like for sending e-mail

column.name: GUARDTYPE
column.description: whether the role or the groovyscript or the person is the guard

column.name: GUARDPARAMS
column.description: parameters for guards

table.name: TSLA
table.description: service level agreement

table.name: TORGPROJECTSLA
table.description: service level agreement for a customer in a project

table.name: TREADISSUE
table.description: Mark issues as unread if it is missing from this table

table.name: TLASTEXECUTEDQUERY
table.description: store the last n executed queries with all data needed to execute them again

column.name: PERSON
column.description: executed by this person

column.name: QUERYTYPE
column.description: can be dashboard link, saved/parametersized/instant tree query/tql query

column.name: QUERYCLOB
column.description: the query key in TCLOB for saved but parameterized/instant queries and dashboard links: the clob value contains either the xml (tree queries) or the properties (dashboard links)

column.name: QUERYKEY
column.description: key in queryRepositoryID or projectID or releaseID or basketID

table.name: TGLOBALCSSSTYLE
table.description: application wide css styles for in time, overdue, overbudget etc. issues
